learn:
This help section can be found on nearly every page of the platform. It's here to give tips for every page and help as you go along. It can be pulled up at any time by clicking on the question mark icon above the main menu.

This activity page is where you’ll find an overview of what's happening with your sales, your mailing lists, and find out what's new from us.

If you'd like to make a new element or edit an old one click on the elements tab above. To edit, publish, or unpublish your page click on the tab with your page URL.

copy.time_to_add_campaign: Campaigns are an optional way to organize your elements. Within a campaign, you can add or edit elements, and keep track of their activities.
copy.public_page: Your public page is live at:
copy.public_not_live: Your public page is not live yet.
copy.select_campaign: Select which campaign you want to publish from the dropdown below.
copy.hello_new: Hello, it looks like you’re new here. Thanks for signing up and kicking our tires.
copy.how_platform_works_1: The platform works with your own storage, payment, and mailing list accounts. To add connections to your services, open the
copy.how_platform_works_3: , click 'Connections,' and choose the type of account you'd like to connect.
copy.publish_campaign_info: Publishing a campaign sets it live as your public page, using the theme you've set above.
copy.embed_info_1: If you don’t want to publish a page you can embed any element anywhere on the web. Simply click the quick embed icon
copy.no_elements: No elements have been created. Click the +Add button in the campaign window above to create and embed elements on the platform.
copy.no_elements_add_campaign_1: No elements have been created. You must
copy.no_elements_add_campaign_3: before you can create and embed elements on the platform.
copy.subtitle: Since
copy.alert_tour: We have created a new platform tour to help you find your way around our new features. Click here to check it out.
copy.alert_commerce_settings: We've added a few extra basic commerce settings that you'll need to set up to accept payments. Click here to check it out.
copy.firstuse_title: Welcome to the CASH Music platform.
copy.firstuse_body_1: We noticed it's your first time using the platform. First off, thank you so much for trying out our tools, we really apprecite it! We've been working hard to simplify the workflow for everyone, so it's easier than ever for you to get started. On this page you can expect to see notifications on mailing lists & new sales since your last login. We're working to add more info in the future to give you a live dashboard of your platform activity.
copy.firstuse_body_2: The CASH platform links to your accounts elsewhere on the web, for hosting digital files, collecting payments for digital and physical sales, and managing mailing lists. The CASH platform also links to your social media accounts to display your latest posts. You can get started by accessing the settings panel which is located top right above the main navigation (gear-shaped button). There you can add connections to your services (Amazon S3, Google Drive, Paypal, Stripe, Mailchimp, Tumblr and Twitter). This will give you the most options to start creating embeddable elements, which you can embed anywhere on the Internet, or on your own CASH Music page.
copy.firstuse_body_3: If you don't have any accounts to add, don't worry. You can still take advantage of CASH tools. Just click on the Elements tab above to get started.
copy.firstuse_tour_body: If you'd like to find out more, or are feeling a little lost you can always take the platform tour.
copy.whatsnew_title: Welcome to the improved CASH Music platform.
copy.whatsnew_body_1: You may have noticed we've had a bit of a re-shuffle. We have worked hard to simplify the workflow for all you great folks! This is the new activity feed. It's where you'll get an overview of what's happening with your
copy.whatsnew_body_2: This is just the begining, we are working on expand these notifications to give you an overview of everything you've created right here.
copy.whatsnew_body_3: It's all part of us making the CASH tools easier for everyone to use. We have also seperated out the workflow for embeded elements and your page, it's now easier than ever to publish, preview & edit your page & embeds just use the tabs in the top right of the display. We've also added a new element type called store, which is of course fully customisable & enables you to sell everything all in one place with one single line of embed code, it's pretty rad. With the store element comes support for the stripe payment platform so you can accept payments there as well!
copy.whatsnew_body_4: Thanks so much for your continued support! xoxo
copy.whatsnew_tour_body: As always you can still always get an overview refresher by taking the
copy.delta_orders_2: recieved since you last logged in.
copy.delta_new_list_2: list since you last logged in.
